data.title: Fabula Nova Crystallis: Clash of Crystals
data.meta_description: We've been waiting a long time for Final Fantasy XV, originally titled Final Fantasy versus XIII, to arrive, and now that it's rumored to be very close to release, there's some speculation as to whether or not it will still thematically reside within the originally planned Fabula Nova Crystallis sub-series. Laymen's Gaming takes an opportunity to take apart the story and themes of the games originally planned for Fabula Nova Crystallis and talks about whether or not it would belong, with the information we know now.
data.text:
We've been waiting a long time for Final Fantasy XV, originally titled Final Fantasy versus XIII, to arrive, and now that it's rumored to be very close to release, there's some speculation as to whether or not it will still thematically reside within the originally planned Fabula Nova Crystallis sub-series. Laymen's Gaming takes an opportunity to take apart the story and themes of the games originally planned for Fabula Nova Crystallis and talks about whether or not it would belong, with the information we know now.

Here Are The Games Leaving PS Plus Extra & Premium In May 2024

Here are the games that will be leaving the Extra and Premium tiers of the PS Plus subscription service in the month of May, 2024.

Final Fantasy XV Review â€“ A Royal Road Trip

Gary Green said: With my fondness for (most) Final Fantasy games and my side goal of finishing off games in my collection with loose ends, a return to Final Fantasy XV seemed inevitable. It also serves as my third Final Fantasy platinum trophy after VII and VIII, a reasonable substitute since Final Fantasy IX is nigh on impossible to master.

Final Fantasy 15 director reveals why he left Square Enix, and announces he's working on 2 new JRPGs

Final Fantasy 15's director has revealed why he left Square Enix back in 2018.

Hajime Tabata famously resigned from Square Enix two years after Final Fantasy 15 shipped in 2016. In a special livestream at the time, Tabata announced his decision to resign from the company, cancelling three of four new story-focused DLC episodes for Final Fantasy 15 in the process.
